hibernate-mapping.query: FROM User as user LEFT JOIN FETCH user.userRoles WHERE username = :username
SELECT DISTINCT user FROM User as user WHERE lcase(firstName) like :pattern OR lcase(lastName) like :pattern ORDER BY lastName, firstName
SELECT DISTINCT user FROM User as user WHERE (lcase(firstName) like :pattern OR lcase(lastName) like :pattern) AND active = true ORDER BY lastName, firstName
SELECT user FROM User as user WHERE active = true ORDER BY lastName, firstName
SELECT user FROM User as user WHERE active = true AND email IS NOT NULL AND email <> '' ORDER BY lastName, firstName
FROM UserDepartment as userDepartment WHERE lcase(name) like :name AND lcase(code) LIKE :code

SELECT DISTINCT user FROM User as user WHERE (lcase(firstName) like :pattern OR lcase(lastName) like :pattern) AND active = true AND user.userDepartment.departmentId IN (:departments) ORDER BY lastName, firstName
SELECT DISTINCT user FROM User as user WHERE (lcase(firstName) like :pattern OR lcase(lastName) like :pattern) AND user.userDepartment.departmentId IN (:departments) ORDER BY lastName, firstName
SELECT user FROM User as user WHERE 'ROLE_PROJECTMANAGER' in elements (user.userRoles) AND user.active IS TRUE AND user NOT IN (SELECT prj.projectManager FROM Project as prj)
SELECT user FROM User as user, Project project WHERE 'ROLE_PROJECTMANAGER' not in elements (user.userRoles) AND project.projectManager = user AND user.active IS TRUE GROUP BY user
